name: Yellow mariposa lily
overview: Calochortus luteus is grown for cosmetic purposes as well as habitat restoration. Reproduces monotonically. Blooms during May and June and is not considered endangered.
habitat: This species is found on coastal prairie, grasslands and some open forest floors however, is only found in California.
tags: plant  plants red-brown bright bright-deep yellow flower sparse hairs bulb-shaped lined
